title: Electricity Price Forecasting
description: Design a predictive algorithm that determines optimal energy feed-in timings for individual power producers, enabling investment banks to better assess the financial implications and market dynamics of increased decentralized energy contributions to the grid.

title: Live Trading Platform
description: ​​​​​The overall goal of this project is to create new tools, applications, and integrations around the Alpaca platform and provide users with new ways to trade.

title: Climate Risk Assessment
description: ​​​​​Develop your own ESG score, detail your methodology and offer sample calculations derived from real-world data you've unearthed.

title: Data-driven Decisions in Mergers & Acquisitions
description: ​​​​​Design a robust scoring system that can evaluate the potential success of an M&A transaction.

image.alt: Case 4 - Data-driven Decisions in Mergers & Acquisitions Image

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: ​​​​​Develop a sentiment analysis tool using NLP (Natural Language Processing) techniques.

title: Data-driven Bankruptcy Prediction
description: ​​​​​Develop your own Bankruptcy score method that presents key aspects.
